title: Dutch court orders investigation into China-owned Nexperia
summary_full: The court had previously played a key part in the row over Nexperia in October when it suspended the Chinese CEO Zhang Xuezheng
summary_public: The court had previously played a key part in the row over Nexperia in October when it suspended the Chinese CEO Zhang Xuezheng
